# CipherChat - Secure Messaging App CipherChat is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that provides secure messaging with 256-bit encryption and AI-powered features. The app works on both Android and iOS devices and can be installed as a native-like app. ## Features - **End-to-End Encryption**: All messages are secured with 256-bit AES encryption - **AI-Powered Features**: Smart replies, message summarization, and content suggestions - **Progressive Web App**: Install on any device for a native app experience - **Offline Support**: Basic functionality works without an internet connection - **Cross-Platform**: Works on Android, iOS, and desktop browsers - **Mobile Optimized**: Touch gestures, responsive design, and mobile-friendly UI ## Installation Instructions ### For Users #### On Android: 1. Open the CipherChat website in Chrome 2. Tap the menu button (three dots) in the top-right corner 3. Select "Add to Home Screen" 4. Follow the prompts to install the app #### On iOS: 1. Open the CipherChat website in Safari 2. Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen 3. Scroll down and select "Add to Home Screen" 4. Tap "Add" in the top-right corner ### For Developers #### Local Development 1. Clone this repository 2. Generate app icons by running `node generate-icons.js` (requires Node.js) 3. Serve the files using a local web server: ``` npx serve ``` 4. Open `http://localhost:5000` in your browser #### Deployment You can deploy CipherChat to any static hosting service: **Netlify (Recommended)** 1. Sign up for a free Netlify account 2. Drag and drop the project folder to the Netlify dashboard 3. Your app will be deployed with a custom URL **Vercel** 1. Install Vercel CLI: `npm i -g vercel` 2. Run `vercel` in the project directory 3. Follow the prompts to deploy **GitHub Pages** 1. Create a GitHub repository 2. Push the project files to the repository 3. Enable GitHub Pages in the repository settings ## Security Features - **AES-256 Encryption**: Military-grade encryption for all messages - **Client-Side Encryption**: Messages are encrypted on your device before transmission - **Zero Knowledge Architecture**: We don't have access to your encryption keys or messages - **Perfect Forward Secrecy**: New encryption keys for each conversation - **Local AI Processing**: All AI features run on your device, not in the cloud ## Mobile-Specific Features - **Swipe Gestures**: Swipe right to open sidebar, swipe left to close - **Double-Tap to Like**: Double tap on messages to send a heart reaction - **Pull-to-Refresh**: Pull down to refresh messages - **Offline Mode**: Basic functionality works without internet - **Push Notifications**: Get notified of new messages (requires permission) - **Home Screen Installation**: Install as a native app on your device ## Browser Compatibility - Chrome (Android, Desktop) - Safari (iOS, macOS) - Firefox (Android, Desktop) - Edge (Windows) - Samsung Internet (Android) ## License MIT License ## Contact For support or inquiries, contact support@cipherchat.com
